==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=奋}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|奞|田|t1=bird|t2=field|ls=ic}} – bird spreading its wings to fly.

===Etymology===
Related to {{och-l|翂|appearance of birds flying slowly}}, {{och-l|𦐈|to fly, to soar}} and {{och-l|飛|to fly}}.

===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{lb|zh|of bird}} to [[spread]] and [[flutter]] the [[wings]]
# to [[shake]]; to [[vibrate]]
# to [[wield]]; to [[wave]]
# to [[dash]] [[ahead]]; to [[put]] to [[good]] [[use]]
# to [[strive]]; to [[exert]] [[effort]]
# to [[arouse]]; to [[stimulate]]
